of the pike -> join : 1
of the pike -> book : 3
of the pike -> fleet : 1
of the pike -> war : 1
of the pike -> is : 1
the pike join -> my : 1
pike join my -> email : 1
join my email -> list : 2
my email list -> and : 2
email list and -> be : 2
list and be -> notified : 2
and be notified -> of : 2
be notified of -> new : 2
notified of new -> releases : 2
of new releases -> get : 2
new releases get -> lower : 2
releases get lower -> prices : 2
get lower prices -> on : 2
